TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PageSettings extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable

summary.span: 指定应用于单页打印的设置。

span.span: Specifies settings that apply to a single, printed page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于指定修改将打印页的方式的设置。The class is used to specify settings that modify the way a page will be printed. 通常，设置要打印通过所有页面的默认设置属性。Typically, you set default settings for all pages to be printed through the property. 若要在按页基础上指定设置，处理或事件并修改参数中包含或分别。To specify settings on a page-by-page basis, handle the or event and modify the argument included in the or , respectively. 有关处理的详细信息事件，请参阅类概述。For more information about handling events, see the class overview. 打印有关的详细信息，请参阅命名空间概述。For more information about printing, see the namespace overview. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理事件并检查参数。The following example demonstrates handling the event and checking the argument of . 若要使用此代码，将添加组件名为`PrintDocument1`到 Windows 窗体和关联其事件和`printDocument1_PrintPage`在示例中的方法。To use this code, add a component named `PrintDocument1` to a Windows Form and associate its event with the `printDocument1_PrintPage` method in the example. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven/VB/form1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 使用默认打印机初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the default printer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认构造函数初始化为其默认值的所有字段。The default constructor initializes all fields to their default values. 通常情况下，你不创建的实例，而是改用设置的所有页的设置。Typically, you do not create an instance of , but instead use the to set settings for all pages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数是类似于初始化的新实例和设置属性。The constructor is similar to initializing a new instance of and setting the property.

value.span: ，表示页面的长度和宽度（以百分之一英寸为单位）。

span.span: A that represents the length and width, in hundredths of an inch, of the page.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Color { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应以彩色打印该页。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the page should be printed in color.

value.span: 如果该页应以彩色打印，则为 ；反之，则为 。

span.span: if the page should be printed in color; otherwise, .
The default is determined by the printer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用属性来确定是否打印机支持彩色打印。You can use the property to determine if the printer supports color printing. 如果打印机支持彩色，但不是希望彩色打印，请设置属性`false`。If the printer supports color, but you do not want to print in color, set the property to `false`. 默认行为将是`true`。The default will be `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将打印颜色中的第一页文档，如果打印机支持它。The following code example prints a document with the first page in color, if the printer supports it. 该示例需要变量名为`printDoc`创建后，与和事件处理。The example requires that a variable named `printDoc` has been created, and the and events are handled. 使用和对于此示例的命名空间。Use the and namespaces for this example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法复制到的相关信息`DEVMODE`结构。Call the method to copy relevant information to a `DEVMODE` structure from a . 此方法很有用，在你想要使非托管的 Win32 调用需要`DEVMODE`。This method is useful when you want to make unmanaged Win32 calls that require a `DEVMODE`. 从中复制信息`DEVMODE`结构，调用。To copy information from a `DEVMODE` structure to the , call .

span.span: The x-coordinate, in hundredths of an inch, of the left-hand hard margin.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Landscape { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是横向还是纵向打印该页。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the page is printed in landscape or portrait orientation.

value.span: 如果页面应横向打印，则为 ；反之，则为 。

span.span: if the page should be printed in landscape orientation; otherwise, .
The default is determined by the printer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用属性来确定的角度，以度为单位，纵向旋转以生成横向方向。You can use the property to determine the angle, in degrees, that the portrait orientation is rotated to produce the landscape orientation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置文档的默认页面方向为通过横向属性，并将打印文档。The following code example sets a document's default page orientation to landscape through the property, and prints the document. 此示例包括三个先决条件：The example has three prerequisites: - 一个名为变量`filePath`已设置为该文件的路径为打印。A variable named `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print. - 一个名为方法`pd_PrintPage`，它将处理事件，已定义。A method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the event, has been defined. - 一个名为变量`printer`已设置为打印机的名称。A variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name. 使用， ，和对于此示例的命名空间。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic PageSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PageSettings Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PageSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PageSettings Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PageSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PageSettings Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置该页的边距。

span.span: Gets or sets the margins for this page.

value.span: ，表示页边距（以百分之一英寸为单位）。

span.span: A that represents the margins, in hundredths of an inch, for the page.

value.span: 默认情况下各边的边距都为 1 英寸。

span.span: The default is 1-inch margins on all sides.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在处理时事件时，你可以使用此属性与属性来计算页的打印区域。When handling the event, you can use this property along with the property to calculate the printing area for the page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将设置默认值为文档的页设置为 1 英寸每一侧。The following code example sets the default page settings for a document to margins to 1 inch on each side. 此示例包括三个先决条件：The example has three prerequisites: - 一个名为变量`filePath`已设置为该文件的路径为打印。A variable named `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print. - 一个名为方法`pd_PrintPage`，它将处理事件，已定义。A method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the event, has been defined. - 一个名为变量`printer`已设置为打印机的名称。A variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name. 使用， ，和对于此示例的命名空间。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. summary.span: 获取或设置该页的纸张大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the paper size for the page.
A that represents the size of the paper.

value.span: 默认值为打印机的默认纸张大小。

span.span: The default is the printer's default paper size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A表示通过纸张的大小属性，其中包含之一值。A represents the size of the paper through the property, which contains one of the values. 设置属性为有效页，可通过集合。Set the property for the page to a valid , available through the collection. 有关如何指定自定义的纸张大小的信息，请参阅构造函数。For information about how you can specify a custom paper size, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置文档的默认页，其中包括基于中选择的大小的纸张大小的三个属性`comboPaperSize`组合框，然后将打印文档使用方法。The following code example sets three properties for the document's default page, including the paper size based upon the size selected in the `comboPaperSize` combo box, and then prints the document using the method. 该示例需要变量名为`printDoc`存在和特定的组合框存在。The example requires that a variable named `printDoc` exists and that the specific combo boxes exist. summary.span: 获取打印机的可打印页面区域的界限。

span.span: A representing the length and width, in hundredths of an inch, of the area the printer is capable of printing in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回正确的值，指示的页面方向是横向或纵向。The property returns the correct value, whether the page orientation is landscape or portrait. 此属性可用于打印之外的页上，但在可打印区域内的边距。You can use this property to print outside the margins of the page, but within the printable area.
